/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard React - v1.2.2 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-react * Copyright 2022 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ // reactstrap components import Chart from "chart.js"; import { useState } from "react"; // react plugin used to create charts import { Line } from "react-chartjs-2"; import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { Card, CardHeader, Col, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, Progress, Table, Container, Row, UncontrolledTooltip, CardBody, Button, } from "reactstrap"; import { chartOptions, parseOptions, chartExample3 } from "variables/charts.js"; // core components import Header from "components/Headers/Header.js"; import { Tab } from "bootstrap"; const Assistant = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState("CSD 0"); const [server, setServer] = useState("Select Server"); const [buttonColors, setButtonColors] = useState([ "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", ]); const toggleButtonColor = (buttonName) => { const index = parseInt(buttonName.split(" ")[1]) - 1; // 버튼 이름에서 index 추출 const newButtonColors = [...buttonColors]; newButtonColors[index] = buttonColors[index] === "success" ? "danger" : "success"; setButtonColors(newButtonColors); }; const handleButtonClick = (e) => { let { value: buttonName } = e.target; if (buttonName === undefined) { buttonName = e.target.name; } setValue(buttonName); toggleButtonColor(buttonName); }; const handleDropdownClick = (e) => { setServer(e.target.getAttribute("value")); }; if (window.Chart) { parseOptions(Chart, chartOptions()); } return ( <>
{/* Page content */}

); }; export default Assistant;
